channel.title: Illegal start of crap w/e
channel.description:
[QUOTE]Class20.java:12: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: ')' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: <identifier> expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: ';' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: > expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: '(' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: <identifier> expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:12: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: ']' expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:13: illegal start of type FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:13: <identifier> expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:13: ';' expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ 13 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/QUOTE]
Got this error while adding Swats emote system.

item.title: Illegal start of crap w/e
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
